tasks.title: Setup Next.js 15 Project with TypeScript
tasks.description: Initialize the project with Next.js 15 and TypeScript, including necessary configurations and folder structure, with comprehensive testing and quality assurance workflows.
tasks.details: Use create-next-app to set up a new Next.js 15 project with TypeScript. Configure tsconfig.json for strict type checking. Set up ESLint and Prettier for code quality. Initialize Git repository with semantic versioning commit standards. Install dependencies: React 18, TypeScript 5.1+, @types/react, @types/node, Vitest, Playwright. Create basic folder structure: pages/, components/, styles/, lib/, types/, hooks/, tests/. Implement quality gates to ensure code meets standards. Set up test coverage monitoring to maintain 80% coverage. Create task completion reporting mechanism.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project structure, run TypeScript compiler to check for errors, ensure all scripts (dev, build, start) work correctly. Run Vitest for unit and integration tests with 80% coverage requirement. Execute Playwright tests for end-to-end testing. Verify ESLint/Prettier compliance. Include manual testing instructions for key functionality.

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js 15 project
subtasks.description: Create a new Next.js 15 project using the create-next-app command
subtasks.details: Use 'npx create-next-app@latest' with the '--typescript' flag to set up a new Next.js 15 project with TypeScript support

subtasks.title: Configure TypeScript
subtasks.description: Set up and customize TypeScript configuration for the project
subtasks.details: Create or modify tsconfig.json file with appropriate compiler options for Next.js 15 and your project requirements. Ensure strict mode is enabled as a quality gate requirement.

subtasks.title: Set up ESLint
subtasks.description: Configure ESLint for TypeScript and Next.js
subtasks.details: Install necessary ESLint plugins and create .eslintrc.json file with rules for TypeScript and Next.js. Configure as a quality gate with pre-commit hooks to enforce compliance.

subtasks.title: Configure Prettier
subtasks.description: Set up Prettier for consistent code formatting
subtasks.details: Install Prettier, create .prettierrc file, and integrate with ESLint for TypeScript and Next.js projects. Set up as a quality gate with pre-commit hooks to enforce compliance.

subtasks.title: Set up environment variables
subtasks.description: Configure environment variables for different environments
subtasks.details: Create .env, .env.local, .env.test and .env.production files, and set up Next.js to use these environment variables

subtasks.title: Configure build and deployment settings
subtasks.description: Set up build configuration and deployment options for Next.js 15
subtasks.details: Modify next.config.js file to include necessary build options, and set up deployment configuration for your chosen hosting platform

subtasks.title: Set up Vitest for unit and integration testing
subtasks.description: Configure Vitest for comprehensive unit and integration testing
subtasks.details: Install Vitest and related dependencies. Create vitest.config.ts file. Set up test directory structure with appropriate helpers and mocks. Configure coverage reporting to ensure 80% code coverage requirement.

subtasks.title: Set up Playwright for end-to-end testing
subtasks.description: Configure Playwright for comprehensive end-to-end testing
subtasks.details: Install Playwright and related dependencies. Create playwright.config.ts file. Set up e2e test directory with appropriate test scenarios. Configure CI integration for automated testing.

subtasks.title: Configure Git with semantic versioning
subtasks.description: Set up Git repository with semantic versioning commit standards
subtasks.details: Initialize Git repository. Install commitlint and husky. Configure commit message format to follow semantic versioning (feat, fix, chore, etc.). Set up pre-commit and pre-push hooks for quality gates.

subtasks.title: Create quality gates workflow
subtasks.description: Implement quality gates to ensure code meets standards
subtasks.details: Create a quality gates workflow that checks: TypeScript strict mode compliance, ESLint/Prettier compliance, test coverage minimum of 80%, and successful test runs. Configure to run on pre-commit and/or CI pipeline.

subtasks.title: Create manual testing instructions
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive manual testing instructions for key functionality
subtasks.details: Create a TESTING.md file with step-by-step instructions for manually testing key functionality. Include expected outcomes, edge cases, and visual verification steps.

subtasks.title: Implement task completion reporting
subtasks.description: Create a mechanism for generating task completion reports
subtasks.details: Create a script or tool that generates a comprehensive report of completed tasks, test coverage, quality gate compliance, and outstanding issues. Configure to run as part of the build process or on demand.

tasks.title: Integrate Shadcn UI and Theming
tasks.description: Set up Shadcn UI components and implement theming with dark and light mode support.
tasks.details: Install Shadcn UI: npm install @shadcn/ui. Set up TailwindCSS configuration. Create theme.config.js for customization. Implement dark and light mode toggle using next-themes. Set up CSS variables for theming. Create a ThemeProvider component. Implement responsive design utilities. Install and set up Lucide React for icons.
tasks.testStrategy: Test theme switching functionality, verify responsive design on various screen sizes, ensure all Shadcn UI components render correctly in both themes.

subtasks.title: Install Shadcn UI
subtasks.description: Set up Shadcn UI in the project
subtasks.details: Install Shadcn UI CLI, initialize it in the project, and add necessary dependencies

subtasks.title: Configure base theme
subtasks.description: Set up the base theme for Shadcn UI
subtasks.details: Create a base theme configuration file, define color palette, typography, and spacing

subtasks.title: Implement dark mode
subtasks.description: Add dark mode support to the theme
subtasks.details: Create dark mode color variants, implement theme switching functionality

subtasks.title: Customize Shadcn components
subtasks.description: Modify Shadcn components to match design requirements
subtasks.details: Customize buttons, forms, cards, and other frequently used components

subtasks.title: Implement responsive layout
subtasks.description: Create a responsive layout system
subtasks.details: Define breakpoints, create responsive grid system, implement flexible component layouts

subtasks.title: Test and refine
subtasks.description: Ensure proper integration and responsiveness
subtasks.details: Test on various devices and screen sizes, refine components and layout as needed

tasks.title: Implement Data Provider Architecture
tasks.description: Create a unified DataProvider interface and implement CSV file processing for initial data source.
tasks.details: Create DataProvider interface with methods for data fetching and processing. Implement CSVDataProvider class. Use Papa Parse (v5.4+) for CSV parsing. Handle file upload and processing for report.csv and traffic_report.csv. Implement error handling and validation checks. Create utility functions for data transformation and joining between files.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test DataProvider interface and CSVDataProvider implementation. Test with sample CSV files, including edge cases like empty files or malformed data.

subtasks.title: Define DataProvider interface
subtasks.description: Create an abstract interface for the DataProvider with essential methods
subtasks.details: Include methods for data retrieval, connection management, and error handling

subtasks.title: Implement CSV file reader
subtasks.description: Create a class to read and parse CSV files
subtasks.details: Implement file opening, line-by-line reading, and basic CSV parsing functionality

subtasks.title: Develop CSV data validation
subtasks.description: Implement data validation for CSV content
subtasks.details: Create methods to check data types, required fields, and data integrity

subtasks.title: Create CSV to object mapper
subtasks.description: Develop a mechanism to map CSV data to object structures
subtasks.details: Implement reflection or annotation-based mapping for flexible object creation

subtasks.title: Implement error handling and logging
subtasks.description: Add robust error handling and logging mechanisms
subtasks.details: Implement exception handling, error reporting, and logging for troubleshooting

subtasks.title: Optimize CSV processing performance
subtasks.description: Improve the performance of CSV reading and processing
subtasks.details: Implement buffering, multi-threading, or memory-efficient processing techniques

subtasks.title: Create unit tests
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive unit tests for all components
subtasks.details: Write tests for interface methods, CSV processing, validation, and error handling

tasks.title: Setup Zod Schemas for Data Validation
tasks.description: Create Zod schemas for runtime validation of CSV data structures.
tasks.details: Install Zod (v3.21+). Create separate Zod schemas for report.csv and traffic_report.csv structures. Include all fields mentioned in the PRD. Implement strict type checking and custom error messages. Create utility functions for applying Zod schemas to parsed CSV data.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for Zod schemas using various input data scenarios. Test with both valid and invalid data structures.

tasks.title: Implement State Management with Zustand and XState
tasks.description: Set up Zustand for global state management and XState for UI state machines.
tasks.details: Install Zustand (v4.3+) and XState (v4.37+). Create a root store with Zustand for global app state. Implement separate stores for filters, data, and UI state. Create XState machines for async operations (data fetching, processing, chart rendering). Integrate XState with React components using useMachine hook. Implement persistence for filter state across tabs.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for Zustand stores and XState machines. Test state transitions and ensure correct behavior in various scenarios.

tasks.title: Develop Data Fetching Layer with React Query
tasks.description: Implement data fetching and caching strategy using React Query.
tasks.details: Install React Query (v4.29+). Set up QueryClient and QueryClientProvider. Create custom hooks for fetching and caching CSV data. Implement query invalidation and refetching strategies. Integrate with XState for managing loading states. Implement error handling and retry logic.
tasks.testStrategy: Write integration tests for React Query hooks. Test caching behavior, error handling, and refetching scenarios.

tasks.title: Create Global Filtering System
tasks.description: Implement a global filtering system with AND logic and persistence across tabs.
tasks.details: Create a FilterStore using Zustand. Implement filter categories: date range, Sub2/Landing ID, Source, OS Family, Currency, Player Status. Use react-datepicker (v4.12+) for date range selection. Implement multi-select functionality for applicable filters. Create utility functions for applying filters to data. Ensure filter persistence across tab navigation.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for filter logic. Test filter application on sample datasets. Verify filter persistence across tab navigation.

tasks.title: Develop Overview Tab with KPI Cards
tasks.description: Create the Overview tab with KPI cards and a time-series chart.
tasks.details: Design and implement KPI card components for FTD Count, CPA Cost, NGR, and ROAS. Use Shadcn UI Card component as a base. Create a time-series chart component using Shadcn Charts (based on Recharts v2.6+). Implement toggleable metrics display. Use d3-array (v3.2+) for data aggregation. Ensure responsive design for mobile view.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for KPI calculations. Test chart rendering with various datasets. Verify responsive behavior on different screen sizes.

tasks.title: Implement Analytics Tab
tasks.description: Create the Analytics tab with traffic breakdown and top performers table.
tasks.details: Implement traffic breakdown visualization (Source → Sub2 → OS). Create a top performers table component. Use react-table (v7.8+) for sortable and filterable tables. Implement detailed player analysis view. Create export functionality for CSV/XLS using xlsx (v0.18+). Ensure all components are responsive and follow the Shadcn UI design system.
tasks.testStrategy: Test table sorting and filtering functionality. Verify export feature with large datasets. Ensure correct data representation in breakdowns and analysis views.

tasks.title: Develop Conversions Tab
tasks.description: Create the Conversions tab with funnel visualization and conversion metrics.
tasks.details: Implement conversion funnel visualization using Shadcn Charts. Create components for displaying CR, CFTD, CD, and RFTD metrics. Implement daily conversion breakdown. Create a 7-day moving average trend chart. Use date-fns (v2.30+) for date calculations. Ensure all visualizations are interactive and responsive.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test conversion metric calculations. Verify funnel visualization with various datasets. Test interactive features and responsiveness.

tasks.title: Implement Cohorts Tab
tasks.description: Create the Cohorts tab with retention analysis and cohort heatmaps.
tasks.details: Implement cohort analysis engine using d3-array. Create components for grouping by Day/Week/Month cohorts. Develop ROAS & Cost2Dep progression charts. Implement cohort heatmaps using Shadcn Charts. Create trend visualization for cohort metrics. Ensure all components are responsive and follow the Shadcn UI design system.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test cohort calculations. Verify heatmap rendering with various datasets. Test cohort grouping functionality and ensure correct data representation.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance and Implement Progressive Enhancement
tasks.description: Optimize application performance and implement progressive enhancement techniques.
tasks.details: Implement code splitting using Next.js dynamic imports. Optimize images using next/image. Implement virtualization for large tables using react-window (v1.8+). Use Web Workers for heavy computations. Implement skeleton loaders for better perceived performance. Ensure proper error boundaries and fallback UI. Optimize React rendering using useMemo and useCallback hooks.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct performance profiling using Chrome DevTools. Measure and optimize Core Web Vitals. Test application behavior with slow network conditions.

tasks.title: Implement Error Handling and Logging
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive error handling and logging system.
tasks.details: Implement global error boundary component. Create custom error types for various scenarios. Implement error logging service (consider using Sentry v7.54+). Create user-friendly error messages and recovery options. Implement retry logic for network requests. Ensure proper error handling in all async operations and state machines.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate various error scenarios and verify proper handling. Test error logging functionality. Ensure user-friendly error messages are displayed correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Accessibility Features
tasks.description: Ensure the application meets WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards.
tasks.details: Implement proper ARIA attributes for all interactive elements. Ensure correct heading hierarchy. Implement keyboard navigation for all features. Ensure sufficient color contrast in both themes. Add skip-to-content link. Implement focus management for modals and dynamic content. Use react-focus-lock (v2.9+) for trapping focus in modals.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct automated accessibility testing using axe-core (v4.7+). Perform manual testing with screen readers. Verify keyboard navigation for all features.

tasks.title: Implement Automated Testing and CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive automated testing and a CI/CD pipeline for the project.
tasks.details: Set up Jest (v29+) for unit and integration testing. Implement React Testing Library (v14+) for component testing. Set up Cypress (v12+) for end-to-end testing. Create test scripts for all major features. Implement test coverage reporting. Set up GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipeline. Configure automated builds, tests, and deployments. Implement linting and type checking in the pipeline.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure high test coverage for critical paths. Run the full test suite in the CI pipeline. Verify successful deployments through the CD process.
